items.content_html: A lightweight, flexible JSON-based database designed for simplicity and performance. FlexiDB supports in-memory caching, asynchronous operations, customizable data storage, automatic backups, and atomic transactions.

items.content_html: A Node.js + Docker project that logs bike availability, weather, and AQI data from CU Boulder’s B-cycle system every 15 minutes. Data is stored in a lightweight SQLite database for time-series analysis and regression modeling.
items.title: beat2319/flatiron-flows: A Node.js + Docker project that logs bike availability, weather, and AQI data from CU Boulder’s B-cycle system every 15 minutes. Data is stored in a lightweight SQLite database for time-series analysis and regression modeling.

items.content_html: got-scraping-client is a lightweight and efficient tool for web scraping tasks using the popular Got HTTP client. It simplifies data extraction from web pages by providing a straightforward API and built-in support for handling common challenges like pagination and rate limiting.

It simplifies data extraction from web pages by providing a straightforward API and built-in support for handling common challenges like pagination and rate limiting.
